phrs.translation: 弄脏, 污蔑, 污染术, 污损
指在说话中夹杂着骂人的话

sentences.sentence: How dare you befoul my lucky number!
sentences.translation: 如何挑战你弄脏我的幸运数目！

sentences.sentence: Certain people used to befoul its Banks every day. Others who came there in the morning to bathe would abuse the offenders loudly.
sentences.translation: 每天都有某些人习惯性地把湖岸弄脏，另一些早上来到湖边淋浴的人会大声地辱骂冒犯者。
